title: Tender for the purchase of 1,200,000 Doses of Adsorbed Diptheria Tetanus, Pertussis, Hepatitis B and Haemophilus Influenza Type b Conjugate Liquid Vaccine BP, USP or EP (Pentavalent)
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon.(Dr.) Rajitha Senaratne, the Minister of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine, to award the Tender for the purchase of the above vaccine essential for the continuation of the child immunization programme, to the bidder recommended by the Standing  Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
